name: SOLID CUBE PROJECT
description:
The game is called "Solid Cube Project"
You play a cube and on each side of it you can attach a weapon or an upgrade.
Explore the map to find all the weapons and upgrades.
As the cube rolls the place of the weapons changes.
This is why the position of the cube is important to defeat different enemies and bosses

- To move use the arrow keys
- For weapons use w s d a 
- To jump use the space bar

The Solid cube game is a personal project, created and developed by me, using the unity game engine.
The game is still the beginning stages of development.

There is a lot to add and develop; 
  - The game can not be saved yet
  - The graphic design of the game
- The design of the enemies is missing

But it's important to me that you try the game and tell me what you think

You can follow the progress of the game:
https://www.instagram.com/magniv.games/
https://twitter.com/MagnivGames
